code: import React from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{useSelector}from"react-redux";import{selectCurrentUser}from"../../redux/user/selectors";import"./styles.scss";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var ProfilePage=function ProfilePage(){var currentUser=useSelector(selectCurrentUser);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-profile-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"title",children:"\u0414\u0430\u043D\u043D\u044B\u0435 \u043F\u043E\u043B\u044C\u0437\u043E\u0432\u0430\u0442\u0435\u043B\u044F"}),currentUser?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-with-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"display-name",children:["\u041D\u0438\u043A\u043D\u0435\u0439\u043C - ",currentUser.displayName]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"email",children:["\u041F\u043E\u0447\u0442\u0430 - ",currentUser.email]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"total-score",children:["\u0421\u0443\u043C\u043C\u0430\u0440\u043D\u044B\u0439 \u0441\u0447\u0451\u0442 \u0437\u0430 \u0432\u0441\u0435 \u0438\u0433\u0440\u044B - ",currentUser.totalScore]})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{className:"area"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button-return",children:"\u0412\u0435\u0440\u043D\u0443\u0442\u044C\u0441\u044F \u043D\u0430 \u0433\u043B\u0430\u0432\u043D\u0443\u044E \u0441\u0442\u0440\u0430\u043D\u0438\u0446\u0443"})})]});};export default ProfilePage;
